nodes.text: LEGO Star Wars: The Force Awakens (Scholastic)

LEGO Star Wars: The Force Awakens is a young-readers adaptation of the film Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens using LEGO sets. Written by Elizabeth Schaefer, it was released by Scholastic on August 30, 2016.
Episode VII The Force Awakens gets the LEGO(R) Star Wars(TM) treatment!
Han, Princess Leia, Luke, and more return in the next chapter of the LEGO(R) Star Wars saga! Features all-new characters including BB-8, Rey, Finn, Poe Dameron, and more!
